sentences.sContent: He said that all metals were composed of mercury and sulphur in different proportions .
sentences.sContent_eng: He said that all metals were composed of mercury and sulphur in different proportions .
sentences.sCn: 他说一切金属都是由水银和硫黄按不同比例构成的。

sentences.sContent: Here they endure long hours at dangerous jobs, wringing flecks of gold from the dirt with mercury.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here they endure long hours at dangerous jobs, wringing flecks of gold from the dirt with mercury.
sentences.sCn: 他们每天在这种危险的环境下工作很长时间，从带有水银的泥沙中淘出金沙。

sentences.sContent: Because glass mercury thermometers harm both humans and the environment, they have been phased out and are no longer recommended.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because glass mercury thermometers harm both humans and the environment, they have been phased out and are no longer recommended.
sentences.sCn: 因为玻璃水银温度计对于人类和环境都有害处，现在已经逐步被淘汰不再建议使用了。

trans.tranOther: Mercury is a silver-coloured liquid metal that is used especially in thermometers and barometers
